word:
In the night season it was presented before me that if you should take this strange step, the enemy of all righteousness would use this as a means of ruining the respect that your children would otherwise have for you, and would create in their hearts a feeling of contempt for you because of your lack of good 


                                     -60- 

judgment. Satan is seeking to destroy your influence in the home and in the church, and among unbelievers as well.
